Oh No

2018-09-15 00:00:00 +0100 - Will

Oh dear!

So it had to happen, and today it did! A quick trip to pick up some supplies and Buddy wouldn’t start… An hour or so wait for the AA, which unfortunately didn’t lead to a solution, led to another wait for a pickup truck. So back at the garage, only a few hours after the indicator fix…

It really is about time I got better at fixing things!
